channel.title: Hosting Server on VPS
channel.description:
Hi all! I have bought VPS Server and installed WinSCP. Then i have uploaded server files to hosting folder with WinSCP. When hoster tryes to open runserver.bat he says that he gets error. How can I change runesver.bat format from : [CODE]@echo off START Java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server cls[/CODE]
VPS is hosting on SSH Puffy.

item.title: Hosting Server on VPS
item.dc:creator: @prototyp3r prototyp3r
item.description:
@prototyp3r wrote:

Hi all!
I have bought VPS Server and installed WinSCP.
Then i have uploaded server files to hosting folder with WinSCP.
When hoster tryes to open runserver.bat he says that he gets error.
How can I change runesver.bat format from :

@echo off START Java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server cls

VPS is hosting on SSH Puffy.

Read full topic
